summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Password Reset feature. All 13 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend flows tested successfully - Admin Reset Password button, Password Reset Modal with copy functionality, User login with temporary password, Force redirect to Change Password page, Password validation requirements, Successful password change and redirect to dashboard.
critical_code_review_comments: ChangePassword.js - Missing data-testid attributes on form inputs for better testability
PasswordResetModal.js - Missing data-testid on Copy button and Close button
seed_data_creation: Test users created and cleaned up during pytest execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: Password Reset feature fully functional. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_password_reset.py cover: admin reset-password endpoint, change-password endpoint, force_password_change flag, password strength validation, activity logging. Frontend tested: Admin Users page Reset Password button, Password Reset Modal with temporary password display and copy, User login redirect to /change-password when force_password_change=true, Change Password page with real-time validation, successful password change redirects to dashboard.

features_tested.admin_reset_password_button: PASS - KeyRound icon button visible in Users table Actions column
features_tested.reset_password_api: PASS - POST /api/admin/reset-password/{user_id} returns temporary password and sets force_password_change=true
features_tested.password_reset_modal: PASS - Shows temporary password, Copy button, warning about password not shown again
features_tested.force_password_change_flag: PASS - Set to TRUE after admin reset, returned in login response
features_tested.login_redirect: PASS - User with force_password_change=true redirected to /change-password
features_tested.change_password_page: PASS - Shows warning banner, password requirements checklist with real-time validation
features_tested.password_validation: PASS - Validates 8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, passwords match
features_tested.change_password_api: PASS - POST /api/auth/change-password validates current password, enforces strength requirements
features_tested.post_change_redirect: PASS - After successful password change, user redirected to /dashboard
features_tested.force_password_change_cleared: PASS - force_password_change set to FALSE after successful password change
features_tested.activity_logging: PASS - PASSWORD_RESET and PASSWORD_CHANGED actions logged in activity logs

api_endpoints_tested: GET /api/admin/logs - Shows PASSWORD_RESET and PASSWORD_CHANGED actions
